attributes.action: Petition to ban the openly sexist "Loose Women" from the media industry.
attributes.additional_details:
Day-in-day-out the cast of Loose Women are openly sexist on live television and get away with it. Whilst Andy Gray was sexist on a radio broadcast and lost his job (Whilst we totally agree what he had done is not at all acceptable.)

If 1 person loses their job for one case of sexism, then why do the cast of Loose Women who are openly sexist and discriminatory in their opinions every weekday keep their jobs to spout hatred and bias views?
